entry.dcterms:title: Polish General Social Statistical Survey 1993
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C86: Polish General Social Statistical Survey 1993. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Cichomski, Bogdan
Sawinski, Zbigniew
entry.dcterms:contributor: Polish Sociological Association Center of Field Research
entry.dcterms:description: social environment, mobility, family structure, women's situation, fertility, abortion, sexual behavior; job, education, income, place of work and their role, to what extent respondent is satisfied with them; data on elections (1990, Election of President; 1991, Election of MPs); the role and effects of politics; the role of religion
entry.dcterms:subject: income, property and savings
childbearing, family planning and abortion
local society, region
labour and employment
religion and values
working conditions
political institutions, public administration
social and occupational mobility
family life, marriage, relationship
elections
education, school
social welfare policy and systems
science and technology
gender and gender roles
household
survey data
time-series
Multi-stage random sample. In both years 2000 households were selected into the sample, one person over 18 years was interviewed in each household.
face-to-face interview
A
